resources.string: This application was created by\nFernando Barillas (©2012–2013)

Instructions:
 1) Make sure you have an SD card inserted
 2) Press the button
 3) Grant SuperUser permissions to the app
 4) Wait a few seconds
 5) Get your unlock code
Your carrier unlock code was found:
Your unlock code has been saved to:
Your unlock code could not be saved to SD card
Your unlock code could not be found.\n\nAre you sure your phone is rooted and you have given the app SuperUser permissions?

These buttons allow you to create a backup and restore the backup. The backup files are created on your SD card.
 Instructions:
 1) Press EFS Backup/Restore
 2) Wait for the success message
 3) Verify that a backup has been created at
 /sdcard/efs_backup.tar
 
 If the backup fails, make sure you have an SD card inserted and you have busybox installed!

Use the buttons below to unlock/lock your phone. This tool allows you to unlock your phone without having to use an unlock code.

 Always create a backup before attempting an unlock!

 Instructions:
 1) Create a backup
 2) Create a backup!
 3) CREATE A BACKUP!
 4) Press Hex Lock/Unlock
 5) Restart your phone
Output unlock code to SD Card

By pressing "I Accept", I acknowledge that it is my responsibility to verify that cell phone unlocking is legal under my jurisdiction, and that I accept any and all responsibility from the repercussions of unlocking my cell phone.
